member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.MaxRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows to display.

member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum items per row.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum items per row.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether "My List" row is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether "Recently Added" row is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether "Random Picks" row is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether "Long Not Watched" row is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of enabled genres.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of blacklisted genres.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.RecentlyAddedDays
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days for "Recently Added" definition.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.LongNotWatchedMonths
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of months for "Long Not Watched" definition.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.MinGenreItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum number of items a genre must have to be displayed.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.MyListLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in "My List".

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.RandomRowOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row order should be randomized.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.LazyLoadRows
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether rows should be lazy loaded.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.NetflixRows.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.ReplaceHeartWithPlus
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether heart buttons should be replaced with plus icons.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items in My List row.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items in Recently Added row.
